method.name: Fuzzy Rough K-Nearest Neighbors Approach

reference.ref: H. Bian and L. Mazlack, Fuzzy-rough nearest neighbor classification approach, in Proceedings of the 22th International Conference of the North American Fuzzy Information Processing Society (NAFIPS'03),Chicago, Illinois, USA, July 24-26, 2003, pp. 500-505.

generalDescription.howWork: FRKNNA incorporates the lower and upper approximations using the memberships obtained by the same method that FuzzyKNN. The decision rule assigns the new instance to the class whose difference between the lower and upper approximation is maximum.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN voting rule.
k Value (init): K value used in the initialization process.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: FRKNNA-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.15909090909090912 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.09020179397530642 Correctly classified: 0.8409090909090908 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8631578947368421 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8736842105263158 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8631578947368421 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8315789473684211 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.84375 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8125 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.15612938596491227 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.017938707078327853 Correctly classified: 0.8438706140350878 Global N/C: 0.0
